name: Civil War: 1863
description: Relive iconic battles of the American Civil War. Take command of both the Union and Confederate forces in this exciting turn-based strategy game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Sound Card: DirectX compatible graphics card

reviews.review_text: The game is pretty basic, battles feel really small and there dose not seem to be any histrocal battles. The game is still fun and for $10 its ok. If you are looking for something a bit more complex/grand in scale then I would recommend ultimate general gettysburg over this.
Its a kick back session for just fun. If you want a hardcore game this is not it. But if you just want to have fun for a few minutes out of your day ... Get the game !
